Package fr.upmc.components.exceptions

Exceptions for the basic component model.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ComponentShutdownException
    The class ComponentShutdownException Description Invariant invariant true Created on : March 18, 2014
    ComponentStartException
    The class ComponentDidNotStartException Description Invariant invariant true Created on : March 18, 2014
    ConfigurationException
    The exception ConfigurationException is thrown when some something unexpected happen or an unacceptable state is reached during the BCM configuration.

Package fr.upmc.components.exceptions Description

Exceptions for the basic component model.

This package introduces exceptions thrown within the basic component model.
